section.title: Summary
section.p: With the Excel table input plugin it is possible to create forrest tables directly from Excel XML output. Excel sheets will be translated into sections, and each sheet will generate a table. Only simple tables are supported (by now). Formatting is not transferred to forrest but some calculations are.

section.title: Documentation
section.p: The How-to section describes step by step how to create and include an Excel table in forrest.

section.title: Examples
section.p: The samples section contains the following examples:

ul.li: Simple table: Shows the basic features
Table with figure: Shows how to embedd a figure with the table
Color table: Specialized table to highlight cells in the color specified
